original: Lundh, Ingrid Hanna Alina, lärarinna, Göteborg, f. 1/2/86 i Visby av landskamr. Oscar Melin o. Anna Hermanna Lindström. G. 13 m. lärov:-adj. Atle Lundh. Barn: Hans Lennart f. 17, fil. lic., Märta 18, skolkökslär., Torsten 22, fil. kand., stud. v. hand:-högsk. i Gbg. — Ex. v. h. lär:nesem. i Sthlm 07. Res. t. Norge, Danni., Tyskl. o. Schweiz. Lär. v. Visby h. flicksk. 07-13, Skövde elem:lärov. f. f’L 14-15, i Trollhättan 15-16, Näsisjö 21-32, Majornas komm. flicksk. i Gbg sed. 37. I Nässjö bl. a. led av barna-v:ndn 29-32, kyrkofuHm. 31-32 samt ordf. i RK-krets 30-32. Sekr. i styr. f. Gbgs o. Boh. landstings yrkessk. 36-45, suppl. i hälsov:ndn i Gbg sed. 40, ordf. i Nässjö husm.-fören. 23-32, Smål. husmiförb. 28-32, Gbgs husm:-fören. 41-45 ’samt Gbgs o. Boh. 1. hus-mrförb. sed. 41, led. av Sv. husm:-fören. riksförb. centr istyr. sed. 29. Skr.: Sv. husmiförb. 25 år (44).
translated: Lundh, Ingrid Hanna Alina, teacher, Gothenburg, b. 1/2/86 in Visby, daughter of landscape painter Oscar Melin and Anna Hermanna Lindström. Married on 13th with school-teacher adjunct Atle Lundh. Children: Hans Lennart b. 17, Phil. Lic., Märta b. 18, school kitchen teacher, Torsten b. 22, Phil. Cand., student at Handicrafts College in Gothenburg. Graduated from teacher's seminary in Stockholm in 1907. Traveled to Norway, Denmark, Germany, and Switzerland. Taught at the Visby girls' school from 1907-1913, Skövde elementary school from fall 1914-1915, in Trollhättan 1915-1916, Nässjö 1921-1932, Majorna municipality girls' school in Gothenburg since 1937. In Nässjö, among other things, served on the children's welfare committee from 1929-1932, church council from 1931-1932, and was chairman of the Red Cross district branch from 1930-1932. Secretary in the board of the Gothenburg and Bohus County Vocational School from 1936-1945, substitute in the health committee in Gothenburg since 1940, chairman of the Nässjö housewives' association from 1923-1932, Småland housewives' association from 1928-1932, Gothenburg housewives' association from 1941-1945, and Gothenburg and Bohus County 1st housewife association since 1941, member of the Swedish Housewives' Association National Association Board since 1929. Published: Swedish Housewives' Association 25 years (1944).
